text: Dave is a 1993 American political comedy film directed by Ivan Reitman, written by Gary Ross, and starring Kevin Kline and Sigourney Weaver. Frank Langella, Kevin Dunn, Ving Rhames, Charles Grodin and Ben Kingsley appear in supporting roles. The movie tells the story of a coup d'état against a medically-incapacitated President of the United States, which results in political maneuvering and rival factions vying for control of power.
